nodes.text: Security Hub M-02U was a security station located at the Market Station on Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Kaliyo Djannis and the Alliance Commander disabled the Security Hub in preparation for their assault on the Overwatch.
Security Hub M-02U appears on Zakuul during Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise of the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion.
